divs: sighting detailsi have many parrots i take outside throughout the day and so my eyes are always on the sky looking for predators in efforts to keep my parrots safe.after dark a go out for a smoke a few times before bed and still at times look up for shooting stars and constellations.after the second time out on 8\17\11 i saw one bright star like object i didn't recognise in that area of the sky at that time of night. on second glance, it moved in a direction toward the center of the sky. the object was over a mile high and blended with the stars. while watching as i move across the sky, it gained speed and left the atmosphere; i know this because it faded off into the distance, tho the distance was the center of the sky and the light got dimmer.i videoed the first sighting, and the camera only recorded blackness.as i gave up on the camera on my phone, i called my mother to tell her, as i did i saw a second one of same hight in a separate part of the sky and it did the same thing in a completely different part of the sky at different angle.i dismissed both events as a result of reading about the new changes of flight options for space and nasa, (being that i've never seen so it could be a what it was) then on second thought today, i decided that their was nothing about these kinds of abilities nor anything about take-off's two in the same 15 min. im reporting this being that i'm thinking that ufo's are real now, after this the 3rd sighting and no pictures or video of the one im reporting, tho i do have video of the first one i saw in high point nc i havent let anyone see it other then family i kept both videos on my iphone and can prove that one i just hop im not the only one that saw these events thanks
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Thomasville
There were no other sightings in Thomasville on or around August 17th 2011
